alert.note: Alert for Barton; Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 1:57PM CST until January 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected with total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. North winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause significant blowing and drifting. * WHERE...Russell, Lincoln and Barton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Monday to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Very difficult to impossible travel conditions are expected due to significant blowing and drifting of snow. The very strong north winds will cause dangerous and extremely low visibility whiteout conditions at times. The hazardous conditions could impact Monday evening and Tuesday morning commute. The very gusty north winds could also bring down small tree branches and some power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
